info.name: AcademicLint API
info.description:
Semantic clarity analyzer for academic writing.

This collection contains all available API endpoints for the AcademicLint service.

## Getting Started

1. Start the API server: `docker-compose up api` or `make dev-server`
2. Set the `base_url` variable to your server address
3. Run requests to analyze text

## Authentication

Currently, the API does not require authentication for local development.
For production deployments, configure appropriate authentication middleware.

request.description:
Analyze text with custom configuration.

Demonstrates using:
- `level`: Analysis strictness (relaxed, standard, strict, academic)
- `min_density`: Minimum acceptable density threshold
- `domain`: Academic domain for specialized terminology

Analyze text with academic-level strictness.

Uses the strictest analysis level, appropriate for formal academic writing.

Analyze longer text with multiple paragraphs.

Returns per-paragraph analysis with individual density scores.

Analyze text with custom domain terminology.

Provide a list of domain-specific terms that should not be flagged as jargon.

List all available built-in domain configurations.

Returns domains that can be used in the `domain` config parameter.
